doc.field: secretary clinton on the real issues. you know, i want to break up the wall street banks. she doesn't. i want to raise the minimum wage to $15. she voted for $12. she voted for the war in iraq. i voted against fracking. she does not. i believe we should have a tax on carbon and deal aggressively with climate change. that is not her position. those are some of the issues i'm on. do a front page story, that's a problem for the 'new york times,' not for my campaign. i want to ask a little bit about the platform and the
